ComicInfo.Title: The Promise
ComicInfo.Summary: The Promise: Now a vampire, Damian tries to play along with the vampires' goals of capturing heroes in order to get an audience with the vampire king in an attempt to bring him down.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-22 22:45:56. [CVDB926039] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 00:49:16. [Issue ID 2404020]
